authors.bio: Chief Technical Octopus. Accessibility and React developer. Open-source contributor. Needs coffee to function.
authors.name: Matthew Riley MacPherson

fields.summary:
For a relatively simple app, Mic Drop took a lot longer than you might think to build. It turns out that there's a lot more to simplicity than there seemsâ€”and audio, in particular, is especially complex.

Matt explores beneath the surface to share what we've learned from our first foray into macOS app development, from a (mostly) technical perspective.
fields.title: How to mute a mic in six months

tags.name: development
tags.summary: From how we build apps to tutorials on how to use frameworks and open-source libraries, we like to impart our experience and "wisdom", from time-to-time.
